Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.backend.budgeting

Class Transfers

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.backend.budgeting.Transfers
public class Transfers extends Object
A class that represents a collection of transfers. The collection of transfers is an ArrayList. The class is used for displaying the transfers in the GUI. The class is also used for deleting transfers, depending on the type of the transfer.
Version:
1.0 - 24.04.2023
Author:
Emil J., Vegard J., Sander S. and Elias T.

    • Transfers

      public Transfers(String type)

    • Transfers

      public Transfers(String accountName, double amount, String date, char transferType)
      Adds a transfer to the list of transfers.
      Parameters:
      accountName - the account name of the account that made/received the transfer.
      amount - the amount of the transfer.
      date - the date of the transfer.
      transferType - the type of the transfer. A for adding to an account, B for transferring between accounts.
